name: UP909980 - ASTA
description:
Fixes:

- Fixed turret target acquisition

- Lowered volume of charging sfx.

Final fixes before submission:

- More balanced gameplay (asteroids increase in spawn speed depending on score)

- turrets made more lively with random movement and recoil.

======================

Here's my rushed submission.  I was moving house this weekend and so have to go to my Mum's for internet haha.

Managed to put this together somehow. Please give me a day off.

Most of what I used was below but once I got a feel for the coding version of it, I mainly used the referencing on yoyogames website for what functions does what and how to use them.

My twist is that you can spawn turrets to shoot too. There is a bug with this as the turret doesn't choose the closest enemy and instead tries to shoot around the wrap of the screen. Very odd.

Enjoy

All sound effects, music, font (apart from Ariel) and art are mine made specifically for this.
